description: Stream Watcher searches popular distribution platforms (using the fantastic canistream.it service) to find whether the movie you want to watch is available to stream, rent, buy, or watch on demand.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Stream Watcher if I can stream Superman.
Alexa, ask Stream Watcher can I rent the Godfather?
name: Stream Watcher
shortDescription: Want to watch a movie? Find out if you can stream it with Stream Watcher!
